title: Can anyone log in to accoutns ?
body:
cant login to my account or other accounts ?
any thing rito ?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey, the servers were having tech difficulties to the point users where unable to login or connect to the servers for a period of time.

Instead of posting in the future you can find information about server status over at http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce which will give you a run down of any problems the server may  be experiencing
